sentences.en: B : focus on teamwork, interpersonal, inter - departmental communication and coordination with each other.
sentences.cn: 注重团队合作精神, 人与人之间, 部门与部门之间相互沟通与协调.

sentences.en: Carlson's feeling for people undoubtedly helped him maintain his brand of teamwork.
sentences.cn: 卡尔森对人的感情无疑地帮助保住了他那协同工作的牌子.

sentences.en: Do you think our good teamwork comes from our star signs?
sentences.cn: 你认为我们的默契是缘于我们星座的关系 吗 ?

sentences.en: Emphasis on teamwork, good communication and coordination ability and organizational capacity.
sentences.cn: 注重团队精神, 有良好的沟通协调能力与组织能力.

sentences.en: Football requires teamwork even more than individual skill.
sentences.cn: 足球运动需要队员协调合作甚于个人之技术.

sentences.en: Good teamwork between the players is not easy to get.
sentences.cn: 队员之间很难做到配合默契.

sentences.en: He kept asking us to remember TEAMWORK.
sentences.cn: 他不断地提醒我们要注意配合.

sentences.en: Her features did not seem to know the value of teamwork.
sentences.cn: 她的花容,似乎不知(五官)集体配合之价值为何物.

sentences.en: However, perhaps the biggest factor in their success is teamwork.
sentences.cn: 然而, 他们成功的最大原因或许是团队合作.

sentences.en: In football teamwork is even more important than individual skill.
sentences.cn: 在橄榄球比赛中,全队的配合比个人技术甚至更加重要.

sentences.en: She stressed the importance of good teamwork.
sentences.cn: 她强调了团队合作的重要性。

sentences.en: The boss was a firm believer in developing strong teamwork.
sentences.cn: 老板对培育坚强团队精神的重要性深信不疑.

sentences.en: The coach believes that good teamwork is the key to victory.
sentences.cn: 教练相信良好的协作是取得胜利的关键.
他们的团队协作总是很好。

sentences.en: We promote teamwork and benchmark our performance with international standards.
sentences.cn: 西门子鼓励团队合作,在用国际标准衡量员工业绩的同时,努力在企业内部创造让员工充分发挥潜能的气氛.

sentences.en: We want to encourage good teamwork and communication.
sentences.cn: 我们要鼓励良好的团队合作和沟通。

trans.tran_en: when a group of people work effectively together
